news_header: Konecranes reported strong financial results for Q4 2024, with increased operating profit and turnover, and a proposed dividend rise.
news_text: Konecranes, a lifting equipment manufacturer, announced its financial results for the October-December period, showing significant growth as anticipated. Adjusted operating profit rose to EUR 151.5 million from EUR 125.8 million year-over-year, surpassing analyst expectations. The company's turnover increased to EUR 1,212.5 million, and order intake was EUR 1,166.5 million. Earnings per share improved to EUR 1.37, and a dividend proposal of EUR 1.65 per share was made, up from EUR 1.35 the previous year. The comparable operating profit for the entire year reached EUR 520.7 million, up from EUR 419.7 million. The order book at year-end was EUR 3,999.6 million. Konecranes expects stable turnover in 2025 and notes a good demand environment among industrial customers despite macroeconomic challenges.
